meanings.definition: The act or process of building or making something
meanings.sent1: The construction of the new school began last month.
meanings.sent2: The construction of the bridge took longer than expected.
meanings.sent3: The construction workers had a race to see who could build the tallest tower of cards.
meanings.sent4: Her novel's construction of characters was both intricate and captivating.
meanings.sent5: The construction of the sandcastle was a masterpiece of patience and skill.

meanings.definition: The way in which something is built or put together
meanings.sent1: The construction of the puzzle was challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: The construction of the house followed a traditional design.
meanings.sent3: The construction of the sandwich was a messy affair with ingredients spilling everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The construction of the argument was solid, leaving no room for doubt.
meanings.sent5: The construction of the dress showcased the designer's attention to detail.

meanings.definition: The occupation or industry of building or making things
meanings.sent1: He works in construction and enjoys building houses.
meanings.sent2: The construction industry plays a vital role in the economy.
meanings.sent3: The construction workers had a friendly competition to see who could hammer the most nails in an hour.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, the construction of garments is as important as the design itself.
meanings.sent5: The construction of the model airplanes required precision and patience.
